name: ModNation Racers
description:
ModNation™ Racers is a next generation kart racer that empowers you to personalize your entire game. Race both offline and online, then create your own racing experience with your own Mod characters, quirky karts or imaginative tracks. Share with the rest of the PSN and access over 2 Million player creations. There is no end to the karting fun!
Next Gen Kart Racing Action!
•Full Single player storyline with over 25 outrageous tracks
•Explosive Weaponry and Power Ups
•Dynamic Physics for realistic Kart handling
•4 Player Offline Split Screen and 2 Player Online Split Screen Modes!
Complete Customization Options and Tools!
•Design your own track, character, and kart
•Deep, yet easy to access creative tools
•Thousands of customization options
Full Online Community Features!
•Share all of your creations with the community
•Browse over 2 Million community creations
to play, rate, and remix
